name: Rump 'n' Jun - Wowie Jam 3
description:
Rump 'n' Jun

It's just a normal 2D platformer, right? Right??

This game was fully made within a 3 day gamejam ("Wowie Jam 3") by: Askion, Leechy and Tello. It plays with the concepts of 2d platformers.

Keep the topic ("Failure is Progress") in mind while playing and have fun!

There are no controls other than WASD and Space.

In case you're asking, yes we like slimes, ok?
